meanings.definition: Praise or honor received for an achievement or accomplishment.
meanings.sent1: Receiving kudoses from the audience made her feel proud.
meanings.sent2: The actor received many kudoses for his outstanding performance.
meanings.sent3: The cat meowed loudly, expecting kudoses for catching a mouse.
meanings.sent4: Her hard work in the project earned her kudoses from her boss.
meanings.sent5: The student's artwork was so impressive that it garnered kudoses from everyone.

meanings.definition: To give praise or honor to someone for an achievement or accomplishment.
meanings.sent1: She kudoses her friend for winning the race.
meanings.sent2: The teacher kudoses the students for their hard work.
meanings.sent3: The dog kudoses its owner with a wagging tail for giving treats.
meanings.sent4: The coach kudoses the team for their excellent teamwork.
meanings.sent5: He kudoses his sister for her amazing cooking skills.
